name: Kiki and Mimi
description:
Made in 72 Hours for MiniJam 85 - Gold

Kiki Kobold and Mimi Mimic are the best of friends, but recently, Mimi's appetite has been a bit out of wack! She needs to constantly eat or she'll expire in a minute 😲. Kiki, being a caring (if irresponsible) friend, has lured a small band of adventurers into their home dungeon in the hopes of separating them from their gold for Mimi.

Why they didn't just go to see a Monster Cleric is anyone's guess.

-Characters-

Kiki Kobold - Kiki might have four left feet, tripping over herself more than it seems possible. Despite this, she has never had a notable injury.
Mimi Mimic - Mimi says it's mean to eat people. Their money tastes better on its own anyway.

Richard the Tin Can - Nobody knows if there is a man, beast or anything at all beneath that suit of armour. They seem to prefer it that way.

Nyala the Meowstical - A maven of the magic missile, many have wondered if the witch had ever learned another spell. When asked about it, she likes to quote Bruce Lee; "be like water" she'll say.

-Controls-

Keyboard and Mouse :

[W][A][S][D] - Move

Mouse - Aim Dash

Hold Left Mouse Button - Charge Dash

Release Left Mouse Button - Dash

Gamepad :

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - Aim Dash

Hold Right Trigger - Charge Dash

Release Right Trigger - Dash

- TEAM -

Character Design, Art and Programming  by KassieKitsune, Greedy Eve and SleepyLil - @LanFanHasA (Twitter)

Music and Sounds by Olivia Renee Soules - @Olipolygon(Twitter)- Bandcamp
